listing.description:
Enjoy our villa for 8 people in the suburbs of Split with a unique sea view in a peaceful environment, heated 54m2 swimming pool, jacuzzi, spacious terrace with dining area, comfortable armchairs for relaxation, sun loungers, and barbecue.

The 250m2 villa on 2 floors offers 4 double bedrooms, 4 bathrooms, a covered balcony, living room with fireplace and satellite TV, dining area and fully equipped kitchen, laundry room, game room with billiards and cinema area, as well as sauna and bar, additional bathroom, and fitness equipment.
listing.name: Villa Magic View Split
Villa Akuna
listing.description:
Connecting traditional and contemporary architect design – on Island of Brac was created Villa Akuna. Old stone roof, hand finished stone on façade but with big glasses and details makes this villa unique on South Croatia coast. Villa Akuna is a place of quiet contemplation – the historic stone structure is built over 3 levels of high end luxury.

During the winter of 2016 the villa was completed to a very high luxury standard – the villa is now one of the most desirable on the Adriatic as not only is it an executive standard as it enjoys being in a quiet bay with so it is very discreet yet just minutes to the local villages. Villa Akuna is aranged on three floors and its property is enriched with cascading terraces, ideal for relaxing and enjoying the sea view. Each of the 5 bedroom suites has an attached bathroom with fine Italian fit-out from Palomba Laufen. This superb villa is completed sauna, spa, infinity pool, media room, sitting rooms, 2 kitchens, 7 Bathrooms, gym, cellar and large spacious terraces – a great place to come together with your guests for cocktails by the sea or a delicious meal. There is a Sonos music system with Bose speakers throughout the villa. There’s also a pizza-oven at the side of the house too!

We want you to have a great stay, so, with no expense spared and all attention to detail Villa Akuna is prepared with everything you need in order to give you that home away from home feeling. We’d specifcially like to mention the hand selected bedding, soft towels, soaps, etc, and not forgetting the fully-equipped luxury kitchen. Certain serenity can be found at Villa Akuna due to the fact that it is built on a headland with pine trees and wild rosemary growing throughout the garden providing privacy and shade.

At Villa Akuna we like to think that it is not just a Villa rental but a whole experience and that the guests will leave feeling relaxed and wanting to return. There’s plenty of space to spread around. As well as the main lounge, there’s a sea-view balcony with a sofa, coffee tables on the terrace, loungers at the villa BBQ area, sun-loungers down by the water and even a master bedroom with a lounge-suite. Find yourself a comfortable place and enjoy it with family, or find a quiet zone to call your own!

locationItems.label: 1000 meters from the nearest shoping and bakery store

policies.text: Security deposit - 20% of total rental price: Single Fee

listing.name: Villa Extravaganze
listing.description:
Modern Villa Extravaganza is a charming three-story villa located in an attractive part of the Trogir Riviera in bay close to place called Vinisce and only 7km from Marina, 10m from the sea and 20 km from the town of Trogir, which is listed as a UNESCO heritage site. This magical resort has always been known for its rich Mediterranean vegetation, carefully treated ancient olive trees and vineyards, sandy and rocky beaches and coves. Situated in the immediate surroundings of the bay are numerous islands and islets that are just perfect for daily excursions by boat or yacht.
With its exclusive location and modern architecture, Villa Extravaganza represents a perfect combination of natural beauty and attractive design. Location of Villa Mer is just beautiful, quiet bay of crystal clear sea and untouched nature and is ideal for lovers of quiet holidays. Location provides complete privacy, tranquility and silence, away from the hustle and bustle of the city. On the other hand, it is in the vicinity of all the conveniences that one urban place can provide during the day and night.
Villa Extravaganza was built in 2019, it extends on 600m² of beautifully landscaped property. Villa consists of 3 floors; a lower ground floor area with a swimming pool and gazebo, main ground floor, first floor and the second. Villa Extravaganza has 4 bedrooms, 4 king-size beds, 4 bathrooms and 1 guest toilet. The entire residence of Villa Extravaganza is a suitable accommodation for 8 persons.
The combination of natural stone and modern architecture gives this magnificent building one truly special and unique atmosphere. The interior of the villa is designed very tastefully, framed by glass walls, which give the impression of an open space and create one warm and comfortable home atmosphere. The furniture selection perfectly blends with the environment of the villa, which is actually the basis of enjoying the sun, the sea and the surrounding stone and nature.
As you enter the gorgeous property from the seaside, a beautifully designed villa welcomes you. Here, you will experience the true Mediterranean feeling of living. Surrounded by typical beautiful Dalmatian greenery, you will feel as though you are in an oasis of peace and tranquility. Many wonderful and memorable moments on terrace with a beautiful swimming pool of 36m², furnished with outdoor seating for relaxing, can be spent in peace with your loved ones. Here you will also find a gazebo with dining area, ideal for dinners under the stars.
From pool area a few stone stairs lead to the ground floor of the villa, which is reserved exclusively for relaxation and dreams with four bedrooms, as well as gym for active sports and recreational fun. Each of bedrooms has a double king-size bed with a modern en-suite bathroom and terraces.
Internal stairs, passing the central part of the villa, connect ground to the first floor, where the part is intended for socializing. This floor contains a modernly equipped kitchen and a dining table for eight persons, an spacious area with a comfortable living room with a large sofa and LCD TV. The long terrace of the first floor offers a magnificent view of the romantic play of the horizon and sunset, while you are having dinner or enjoying a glass of wine. The top floor of the Villa Mer is a main entrance to villa from the covered parking place.
Villa Extravaganza is a unique villa that reveals all the pleasures of relaxation by the crystal clear waters in the beauty of nature and peace. If you are searching for the perfect oasis of rest and relaxation, then Villa Extravaganza is an ideal choice that is waiting for you!

listing.description:
Prepare for a magical experience in the picturesque archipelago of Northern Dalmatia. The luxurious Magran property spans several hectares of land directly on the turquoise-sparkling sea, on the south side of the island of Pag. Located 8 km north of Novalja, Villa Magran extends over 3.8 hectares of private land with an olive grove and 300m of coastline. After passing through the entrance gate, a path between olive trees leads to the parking lot. At the highest point of the property sits the unique Villa Magran, surrounded by spacious terraces offering overwhelming sea views. The terraces and stone stairs lead down to the pool level, a sun paradise with a 12m long pool, jacuzzi, loungers, parasols, and a pool bar. In cooler seasons or at night, you can enjoy the garden sauna. The small panoramic terrace to the left of the pool is ideal for casual family photos or candlelight dinners with an unforgettable sea backdrop.

Several paths between the olive trees lead down to the private beach club at the south end of the property. The pebble bay, complete with a beach bar, loungers, parasols, and water toys, promises fun with your favorite people, and there is a berth for 2 boats next to the bay. The magnificent Estate Magran, spread over a plot of 3.8 hectares with a living area of 250m², features 5 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, including a spacious master bedroom with a fireplace, accommodating a total of 10 people. The villa, built in a classic Mediterranean style with a flat construction, patio column, and fence amidst the impressive natural landscape, evokes the feeling of a ranch house by the sea. Enter the house through the spacious central atrium living room, featuring seating and play areas with comfortable sofas and a pool table, with access to all other rooms. The dining room has a large dining table and an open kitchen bar, with double doors opening to the terrace, which features an outdoor dining area and grill fireplace. Behind the kitchen bar is a professional kitchen where a chef can prepare delicious dishes if desired. All 5 bedrooms have terrace access, allowing you to enjoy fresh air and stunning views.

Stay in the magnificent Villa Magran and indulge in a luxurious oasis of peace on one of the most unique and unexplored islands on the Adriatic coast – the island of Pag!

The villa offers a 250m² living area on a 38,000m² lot, accommodating 10 guests in 5 bedrooms with 5 bathrooms and 1 toilet. Amenities include a 72m² outdoor swimming pool, Mediterranean-style terraces, sundeck terraces with sea views, full air conditioning, WiFi, LCD SAT TV, BBQ, parking, a private estate, housekeeping, jacuzzi, and sauna. The ground floor layout includes a living area, play area, fully equipped kitchen, toilet, dining room, and 5 double bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. The outside area features a swimming pool, jacuzzi, sundeck terrace, outdoor dining area, outdoor living area with designer seating, BBQ, sauna, and parking.

Included in the price are tourist tax, a welcome basket, mid-week bed linen change, towel change every 3 days, pool maintenance, garden maintenance, concierge service, villa manager, pre-stocking service, basic daily cleaning, baby cot, internet connection, and parking space.

listing.name: Apartment Tower
listing.description:
Star view through the skylight into the vaulted ceiling before bed. This duplex apartment is housed inside a 1700-year-old palace that boasts original features, including exposed stone medieval walls along striking spiral wooden stairs. Parking is possible either in a car park 800 meters away or in car parks 100-500 meters away or, street parking in any way Just enjoy as a car in your Palace!
Apartment Luxury Towers is located in Split; on the 4th floor, inside the 1700-year-old Diocletian’s Palace, a UNESCO monument of zero category and less than 1 km from the beach Bačvice. The apartment of 57 m2 offers accommodation for a maximum of 4 people in two rooms with 2 King bed (160/200) and the equipment is impeccable and consists of a fully equipped kitchen, with all appliances, refrigerator, oven, induction hob, microwave, Nesspresso machine with free capsules, Sauna for 2 people, full bathroom, 2 rooms with 2 beds for 4 people, additional toilet on the first floor, private terrace of 16 m2 with private jazz for 4 people, beautiful views of the old town of Split, sea and Marjan .
Free Wi-fi download 50 mb / s, Upload 20 mb / s
2 rooms with 2 beds (160/200 and 160/200) for a total of 4 people
3 TVs with 200 programs
Sauna for 3 people
jacuzzi for 4 people
Private bathroom
additional toilet upstairs
2 Air conditioners
underfloor heating throughout the apartment
living area with designer furniture and television
Soundbar with the ability to connect your phone with BT technology and listen on speakers distributed throughout the apartment, even in the shower
full equipped bathroom with all additional free extras
Washing machine, Dishwasher
ice machine
NESSPRESSO device with free capsules during the entire stay of the guests

locationItems.label: 50 meters from the nearest shoping and bakery store

listing.name: Vila Cesara
listing.description:
Villa Cesara is distinguished by its neutral earth tones combined with dark blue accents in the interior and a breathtaking outdoor area. The dining area and living room are separated by the entrance area, which features decorative elements. For your culinary needs, the villa includes a light blue kitchen, and for relaxation, there is a cozy living room with a dark blue sofa and satellite TV. Two of the comfortable bedrooms are situated in the basement, along with two bathrooms, while an additional sleeping area is located in the outbuilding. Villa Cesara can accommodate up to 8 people, and dogs are also welcome.

This villa by HMZ represents a rare example of high-class luxury. Romanesque church windows in various earth tones illuminate the staircase to the second floor with warm sunlight. At the top, you will find two more spacious bedrooms with natural wooden floors and ensuite bathrooms. Another staircase leads to the top floor, where a private roof terrace awaits.

The living area of Villa Cesara extends to a spacious outdoor area, adorned with a large pool and plant elements. Light blue seats are provided for maximum comfort, allowing you to soak up the Croatian sun. For dining with loved ones, the fully equipped and covered summer kitchen, accompanied by a high-quality dining area, is ideal. Additionally, to ensure that your four-legged friends also enjoy their vacation, the garden of Villa Cesara is securely fenced and offers plenty of green space.

Perfect Villa for peaceful and authentic Croatian holiday.
This property has 3 apartments. All of them in same size about 60m2 with 2 bedrooms, 1 bathroom, livingroom with kitchen and dining corner, balcony or terace. From all levels you have a nice sea view. 6 parking places, wifi internet, Sat-TV, aircondition are included. A nice pool with waterfall and big terace with some sunbeds for relaxing holidays.
the sea is only 120m away.

listing.name: Villa Infinity
listing.description:
Villa Infinity is a contemporary beachfront retreat located in the charming village of Bobovisca on the stunning island of Brac, Croatia. This stylish villa offers exceptional sea views, a private infinity pool, and upscale amenities across three floors, accommodating up to 10 guests in five en-suite bedrooms. The main living area features a fully equipped kitchen, dining, and living room with modern furnishings, opening to a heated pool and sun loungers. Additional amenities include a summer kitchen, garden, private rock beach, table tennis, darts, and bicycles. There is also a separate TV/Cinema room, completely soundproofed and ideal for leisure.
The island of Brac, the largest central Dalmatian island, boasts beautiful beaches, vineyards, and olive groves. It enjoys over 2,700 hours of sunshine annually, with mild winters and warm summers. Bobovisca, with its picturesque stone houses and historical charm, offers a serene escape with easy access to the island's cultural and natural attractions.

listing.description:
New build villa located on a quiet place by the sea with very nice sea view. The building has altogether about 166m2 living space, some space of balconies and teraces and a big garden with olive trees, a large pool and enough relaxing area.
The full air conditioned house has 3 floors.
2.floor: big living room with dining area and open kitchen.
The full equipped kitchen offers some aparates like stove, microwave, water kettle, coffee machine, fridge and a dishwasher.
The couch can also be a bed for 2 person (200x140cm)
From living area you can enter to the big balcony with open sea view.
On same level is also a small bedroom and a bathroom with shower/WC.
Through the indoor stair case you can reach the 1.floor.
1.floor has 3 bedrooms with double beds (1x180x200cm, 2x200x140cm), 2 bathrooms and a floor with wardrobe. From each bedroom you can reach the balcony in front of. From the stair case you can reach the ground floor. Here is a multifunciton room with small kitchen and dining corner or a bedroom for 2 person. Here is also an entrance to the terace and garden. Also at this level is a sauna, a shower and a seperate toilet.
The terace has altogether 8 sunbeds, some relaxing chairs and a grill.
The size of pool is 10x5m
In front of house is a parking place for up to 2 cars and electric charge station.

blocks.title: Über uns
blocks.paragraph:
Wir sind ein Team regionaler Experten für Luxustourismus mit langjähriger Erfahrung in diesem Bereich. Geboren und aufgewachsen in Deutschland, haben wir in verschiedenen Führungspositionen gearbeitet und sind im Alter von 30 Jahren nach Kroatien gezogen, um deutsche Servicequalität zu etablieren.
Heute verwalten wir erfolgreich zahlreiche Luxusvillen in der Region Mitteldalmatien mit umfassendem Service und expandieren stetig weiter. Wir sind Mitglieder des größten kroatischen Agenturverbands UHPA sowie der Deutsch-Kroatischen Industrie- und Handelskammer in Zagreb.
Mehrere Jahre in Folge wurden wir von Bellevue Europe als 'Beste Immobilienagentur in Kroatien' ausgezeichnet. In den Jahren 2023 und 2024 erhielten wir den Prestige Award für unsere Professionalität bei der Vermietung von Luxusimmobilien in Kroatien.

listing.description:
The moment you step inside this sumptuous holiday residence, you cannot but notice the impressive design and luxurious furnishings of this waterfront villa.

Villa Esperia is located on the property of 800m² and the villa itself spreads over 395m² of living space. This Dalmatian beauty takes your breath away with its sophisticated interior and spacious exterior inviting you to fully enjoy every single moment of your stay. Villa Esperia, thanks to its position and comfortable interior, provides everything you need for maximum enjoyment of your vacation on the Adriatic coast.

Because of the orientation towards the sea, all rooms have a beautiful view of the Dalmatian islands and the crystal clear Adriatic Sea. Villa Esperia has five bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms, offering accommodation for 10 guests. 

All three villas – Marvi, Valis and Espia – feature an extremely rich offer of wellness and entertainment facilities. The offer includes also sauna, gym and table soccer. Enjoy the rich summer program of Rogoznica, try the many delicious gastronomic delicacies and leave your worries behind.

Experience the exceptional natural wealth of lively summer surroundings while enjoying the luxurious accommodation.

listing.name: Villa Esperia

listing.description:
Boutique style villa in center of Split, new renovated in 2023 with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, kitchen, dining room, living room, working room, terace with dining table, lounge corner, some mediterrian flowers and plants and an amazing view to the diocletian palace and the sea with islands. A grill with some staff and a own parking place for up to 2 cars. Very quiet area with big privacy.
The living room has a small bar with additional fridge and wine bar. Fully equipped kitchen, aircondition in all rooms, wifi, smart TV and games for children.
This villa is ideal for families or groups with children.

listing.description:
Exclusive four – bedroom villa with private access to the beach – accommodates up to 8 persons

Ground floor: a large living room, dining area (108 m2), SAT/LCD TV, opens to large terrace with amazing sea views (90 m2, a seating set, deck chairs). An open kitchen (a cooker with a four ring ceramic hob, an oven, a microwave, a freezer, a dishwasher). An indoor pool (rectangular 5 x 2.5 m, 13 m2, counter current swimming). A sauna with a shower. Separate toilet (washing machine and tumble dryer). An atrium with greenery.

Fitness equipment: indoor bike.

First floor: 2 rooms with a double bed each (2x90x200cm), SAT/LCD TV, en suite, opening to a loggia (4m2, an amazing sea view); 1 room with 2 beds (2x80x200 cm), SAT/LCD TV, en suite; 1 room with a double bed (2x90x200cm), SAT/LCD TV, a French balcony, en suite..
